How about "application resource space"?

Doesn't have the greatest acronym,=
 though.

We do use the phrase "REST API" in our company, and it has kind
o=
f bugged me. But in design discussions we talk about "mapping
concepts to t=
he resource space", so that seems to be the idea to
emphasize.

Justin
